title: John Farnham Musical โWhispering Jackโ Sets 2026 SydneyยPremiere
summary: Whispering Jack: The John Farnham Musical is set to debut Nov. 15.
body: A stage musical celebrating the career of John Farnham will premiere in Sydney later this year. Whispering Jack: The John Farnham Musical is set to debut Nov. 15, 2026, at Roslyn Packer Theatre as part of the Sydney Theatre Company โs season, producers announced Monday (Feb. 2). The production will star Michael Paynter in the role of Farnham. Paynter recently led the 2025 Australian season of Jesus Christ Superstar and has previously toured with Farnham, in addition to performing as a member of ICEHOUSE and Jimmy Barnesโ touring bands. โTo be asked to help tell the story of the greatest voice this country has ever produced is an honour that is very hard to put into words,โ Paynter said in a statement. โFor me, John Farnham is the absolute zenith of male singers in all of history.โ Released in 1986, Whispering Jack became the highest-selling Australian album of all time and marked a defining turning point in Farnhamโs career. The musical will focus on the creation and legacy of the album, which includes the hit โYouโre the Voice,” which topped the Australian singles chart for seven consecutive weeks and became one of the country’s best-selling songs. Producer Gaynor Wheโฆ

title: Snow Falls as the Clipse & Pharrell Perform โSo Far Aheadโ at the 2026ยGrammys
summary: The trio from Virginia Beach hit the stage in matching white suits to perform a song from their Grammy-nominated album.
body: Pharrell Williams and the Clipse hit the stage in matching white suits and fur coats with a chorus behind them to perform “So Far Ahead” from their Grammy-nominated album Let God Sort Em Out at the Grammys on Sunday (Feb. 8). Snow fell on top of them toward the end of their set as a not-so-subtle nod to the group’s subject matter, in which they often rap about the trials and tribulations navigating the underworld. Related Here Are the 2026 Grammys Winners: Full List Grammys Red Carpet 2026: Best Photos of Sabrina Carpenter, Olivia Dean & More Justin Bieber, Billie Eilish & More Stars Wear ‘ICE Out’ Pins to 2026 Grammys: Photos The three childhood friends from Virginia Beach already had an eventful night, though. Earlier in the evening, Clipse won best rap performance for the duo’s song “Chains & Whips,” featuring a verse from Kendrick Lamar . “We already took one home for best rap performance, so really happy about that,” Pusha T said during an interview on the red carpet. ‘Chains & Whips,’ shout-out Kendrick Lamar. We already won for the night.” The Clipse was also nominatโฆ
